title: Check In on Trial Progress
description: A sales development representative checks in with a high-potential user halfway through their trial period.

tasks.description: Identify a trial user who has shown high engagement (e.g., invited team members, created projects).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a promising trial user.

tasks.description: Send a personalized email to the user, offering assistance and asking if they have any questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a proactive, helpful conversation.

tasks.description: Based on the user's response, schedule a brief call to provide tips or answer questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent nurtures the lead and increases the likelihood of conversion.
